attributes.additional_details:
The UK government have today confirmed the vaccinations work against the current variant  
The elderly/vulnerable people have now had/been offered the vaccine 
All adults have now been offered the vaccine and infact 28.5 million have had both doses as of 11/06/21 according to the latest online Covid stats
They have promised the vaccine is the way out of this yet stalling on lifting all restrictions 
We need to live with this virus just like we do with flu
Millions of people are suffering poor mental health due to the restrictions
There is a massive strain on business that cannot open particularly the entertainment industry and travel which some may never recover
Please sign and share if you agree these restrictions should be lifted immediately
attributes.background:
Reverse today's announcement and lift all Covid 19 restrictions immediately.
Since March 2020 we have had many lockdowns & inhumane restrictions...yet here we are June 2021 been told there is yet another delay. This is despite 41.5 million people having1 dose of the vaccine. Enough is enough!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584862
